org.trianacode.gui.hci.color

Class ColorManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.hci.color.ColorManager

  • public class ColorManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The ColorManager maintains a register of ColorModels for different tool class types, and a default ColorModel which handles tool class types and color elements not handled by a specific ColorModel. Components can query the ColorManager to discover the color value for particular graphical elements based on class of the tool they are visualizing.

      • getDefaultColorModel

        public static ColorModel getDefaultColorModel()
        Returns:
        the default color model used when no color model is registered for a tool class.

      • setDefaultColorModel

        public static void setDefaultColorModel(ColorModel model)
        Sets the default color model used when no color model is registered for a tool class.

      • registerColorModel

        public static void registerColorModel(java.lang.String toolclass,
                      ColorModel model)
        Registers a color model to handle the color values for a particular tool class. Note that if two models are registered for a tool then the later registered takes precedence.

      • unregisterColorModel

        public static void unregisterColorModel(java.lang.String toolclass)
        Unregisters a color model for a tool class.

      • getRegisteredToolClasses

        public static java.lang.String[] getRegisteredToolClasses()
        Returns:
        an array of tool classes for which color models are registered

      • getRegisteredColorModel

        public static ColorModel getRegisteredColorModel(java.lang.String toolclass)
        Returns:
        the color model regiseted for the specified tool class (or null if no model is registered, i.e. the default color model is used)

      • isRegisteredColorModel

        public static boolean isRegisteredColorModel(java.lang.String toolclass)
        Returns:
        true if a color model is registered for the specified tool class

      • getRegisteredColorModels

        public static ColorModel[] getRegisteredColorModels()
        Returns:
        an array fo the registered color models (including the default color model)

      • getColor

        public static java.awt.Color getColor(java.lang.String element,
                      Tool tool)
        Returns:
        the color for the particular graphical element of the specified tool. Note that if two models are registered for a tool then the later registered takes precedence.

      • getColor

        public static java.awt.Color getColor(java.lang.String element)
        Returns:
        the color for the particular graphical element not associated withd a specific tool

      • getColor

        public static java.awt.Color getColor(Node node)
        Returns:
        the color for the particular node
